<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Handler for `GET /nhi`."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/nhi"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Lists all non-human identities (service accounts and AI agents) with
optional filtering by type, status, owner, risk score, and certification status.

  id={"request"}
